feedback.question: What features would you like to see in an innovative digital banking service?
feedback.results: The respondents overwhelmingly desire personalized financial management tools, such as customized savings plans and investment recommendations based on goals and risk tolerance. Real-time spending alerts and insights are also considered very helpful. A user-friendly mobile app interface for managing finances on-the-go is a must-have feature as well. Machine learning algorithms to analyze spending habits and provide customized insights and recommendations are also mentioned frequently, indicating the importance of incorporating AI technology in digital banking services. Overall, the key takeaway is that consumers value personalized and convenient financial management tools to help them plan and achieve their financial goals.

feedback.question: What concerns do you have about using a digital banking service?
feedback.results: The majority of respondents share concerns around the security and privacy of their personal and financial information when using a digital banking service. They value strong security measures to protect against fraud and cyber threats, transparency and reliability of the service, ease of use, good customer support, and knowledge that the service is compliant with regulations. Respondents are seeking competitive rates, terms and lag-free tech experience before they can trust and adopt the service. The emphasis on security is the top priority throughout the responses, which indicates it is hard to acquire user trust without meeting their expectations on this factor indispensably.

feedback.question: How frequently do you use mobile banking services?
On a scale of 1-10, how important is it for you to have a seamless and user-friendly mobile banking experience?
What would motivate you to switch to a new digital banking service?
On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you to use our new innovative digital banking service?
What specific aspects of our new digital banking service appeal to you?
feedback.results: The key takeaways from the responses are that people were attracted to the new digital banking service due to its personalized financial management tools, customized savings plans and investment recommendations, real-time spending alerts and insights, and user-friendly mobile app. The fact that the service used machine learning algorithms to analyze spending habits and provide personalized insights and recommendations also attracted participants. Security and transparency were also mentioned as important aspects. Overall, there was a consistent emphasis on how the features would help participants achieve their financial goals and make their financial management more effective and convenient.

feedback.question: What changes or additions would make you more likely to use our new digital banking service?
feedback.results: The responses suggest that potential users are looking for a digital banking service that provides competitive interest rates, fees, and innovative features that make it easier to manage their finances on the go. More importantly, usersare looking for more automated features such as investing and preparing for retiring.An attractive feature would also be if the service offered more education resources and financial planning tools. More robust customer support, rewards program or incentives to ensure use and Personalizing the service to meet unique user needs was also cited frequently in the comments as a way of fitting various family scenarios represented by the typical Credit Union user.
